Hello, my name is Zhong Zhun.

I am a full-stack software engineer at CCCCOI, living in Chendu,Mudanjiang,Rongchang,Wuhan,zhuhai, Nanjing, Wuhan, Sanya.

I code Php, Javascript, and Python.

About zputee.github.io

This is my blog site. It was built with Gatsby. It’s also coded in the functional paradigm and fully open sourced.
